It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 42 43 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 44 inline bool 45 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 46 do_resize_if_needed() 47 { 48 if (!resize_base::is_resize_needed()) 49 return false; 50 resize_imp(resize_base::get_new_size(m_num_e, m_num_used_e)); 51 return true; 52 } 53 54 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 55 void 56 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 57 do_resize(size_type n) 58 { resize_imp(resize_base::get_nearest_larger_size(n)); } 59 60 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 61 inline void 62 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 63 do_resize_if_needed_no_throw() 64 { 65 if (!resize_base::is_resize_needed()) 66 return; 67 68 __try 69 { 70 resize_imp(resize_base::get_new_size(m_num_e, m_num_used_e)); 71 } 72 __catch(...) 73 { } 74 75 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 76 } 77 78 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 79 void 80 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 81 resize_imp(size_type new_size) 82 { 83 #ifdef PB_DS_REGRESSION 84 typename _Alloc::group_adjustor adjust(m_num_e); 85 #endif 86 87 if (new_size == m_num_e) 88 return; 89 90 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 91 const size_type old_size = m_num_e; 92 entry_array a_entries_resized = 0; 93 94 // Following line might throw an exception. 95 a_entries_resized = s_entry_allocator.allocate(new_size); 96 97 ranged_probe_fn_base::notify_resized(new_size); 98 m_num_e = new_size; 99 100 for (size_type i = 0; i < m_num_e; ++i) 101 a_entries_resized[i].m_stat = empty_entry_status; 102 103 __try 104 { 105 resize_imp(a_entries_resized, old_size); 106 } 107 __catch(...) 108 { 109 erase_all_valid_entries(a_entries_resized, new_size); 110 m_num_e = old_size; 111 s_entry_allocator.deallocate(a_entries_resized, new_size); 112 ranged_probe_fn_base::notify_resized(old_size); 113 __throw_exception_again; 114 } 115 116 // At this point no exceptions can be thrown. 117 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ONLY(assert_entry_array_valid(a_entries_resized, 118 traits_base::m_store_extra_indicator, 119 __FILE__, __LINE__);) 120 121 Resize_Policy::notify_resized(new_size); 122 erase_all_valid_entries(m_entries, old_size); 123 s_entry_allocator.deallocate(m_entries, old_size); 124 m_entries = a_entries_resized; 125 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 126 } 127 128 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 129 void 130 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 131 resize_imp(entry_array a_entries_resized, size_type old_size) 132 { 133 for (size_type pos = 0; pos < old_size; ++pos) 134 if (m_entries[pos].m_stat == valid_entry_status) 135 resize_imp_reassign(m_entries + pos, a_entries_resized, 136 traits_base::m_store_extra_indicator); 137 } 138 139 #include <ext/pb_ds/detail/gp_hash_table_map_/resize_no_store_hash_fn_imps.hpp> 140 #include <ext/pb_ds/detail/gp_hash_table_map_/resize_store_hash_fn_imps.hpp> 141 142 #endif
